stall.name: Alchemist
stall.description: The walls of this alchemist's stall are covered with shelves with potions, oils, powders, poultices and elixirs, each meticulously labeled.

stall.name: Banker
stall.description: A large book large enough to be seen from the outside rests on the Banker's desk.

stall.name: Bookstore
stall.description: Tomes of different sizes are stacked in man-high towers.

stall.name: Gear
stall.description: This adventurer's market has a tool for every need ... or so the plaque on the wall claims.

stall.name: Nursery
stall.description: The smells of the one hundred and one different plants forms a unique fragrance.

stall.name: Pet Shop
stall.description: This large menagerie echoes with a multitude of animal noises.

item.name: Sleight
item.description:
These volumes explain how to perform the most difficult of sleights.
Effect: Your first mulligan is free.

item.name: Map
item.description:
These ancient charts should facilitate navigation during your travels significantly.
Effect: Quest challenges become available more frequently.

item.name: Lucky Coin
item.description:
This coin is believed to give good luck to its owner.
Effect: Improves the chance of getting a random rare after each match by 15%.

item.name: Estates
item.description:
Land owners have a strong voice in community matters.
Effect: Gives a bonus of %d%% to match winnings. Effect: Improves sell percentage by %.2f%%.

item.name: Zeppelin
item.description:
This extremely comfortable airship allows for more efficient and safe travel to faraway destinations.
Effect: Quest challenges become available more frequently. Effect: +3 life Effect: Activate once for a new set of challenges (re-fuels after a challenge is attempted).

item.name: Pound of Flesh
item.description:
The Alchemist welcomes contributions to his famous Elixir. But beware, you may build an immunity to its effects...
Effect: Alchemist gives you %d credits. Effect: Reduces maximum life by 1.

item.name: Elixir of Life
item.description:
A salty sweet smell rises from the vials bubbling behind the counter.
Effect: Gives +1 to maximum life. Fine Print: Loses effectiveness after 15 uses.

item.name: Charm of Vim
item.description:
A charm fills you with energy, speeding your movements.
Effect: You may have each match be best of 1 instead of 3.

item.name: Charm of Vigor
item.description:
A charm to ward off the fatigue of battle.
Effect: You may have each match be best of 5 instead of 3.

item.name: Cash Stakes
item.description:
A written agreement with the Spell Shop to acquire cards you lose in an ante match from quest opponents.
Effect: Cards lost in an ante match will be available immediately following the match in the Card Shop.

item.name: Bank Membership
item.description:
A token certifying you as a member of the bank, giving you a greater selection of booster packs when you win.
Effect: Adds one more booster pack to the pack selection after you win.
